name: Rope Rescue
description: Fling rope lines between anchor points to build bouncy safety nets that catch falling survivors before they hit the ground.
core_loop: Survivors fall from the top of the screen at varying speeds and angles. You drag between two anchor points on walls, ledges, and platforms to stretch a rope line. Survivors bounce off your ropes and you must chain multiple rope lines to guide them into a rescue zone at the bottom. Ropes have limited elasticity â€” after 3 bounces a rope snaps and disappears, so you're constantly laying new lines while managing which ropes are about to break. Mistime a rope and survivors splat. Each level sends faster, heavier, and more simultaneous survivors while giving you trickier anchor point layouts.
retention_hooks: Combo multiplier for catching multiple survivors on a single rope before it snaps
Unlockable survivor types with unique physics (heavy, floaty, splitting twins) that demand new rope strategies
Star rating per level (all saved, no splats, under par ropes used) with increasingly devious layouts
controls: Touch/click-drag from one anchor point to another to stretch a rope between them. Tap an existing rope to cut it early. That's it â€” two gestures.
